Summary:
Jim Watson (Jeff Goldblum) and Francis Crick (Tim Piggot-Smith) race to find the structure of DNA before Linus Pauling, Maurice Wilkins (Alan Howard), or Rosalind Franklin (Juliet Stevenson) can find the key to unlocking the secret. Directed by Mick Jackson.

Notes:
This award-winning docu-drama was originally produced for the BBC science series Horizon.
If you enjoyed this movie, the original DVD is available from Films for the Humanities & Sciences for a mere (update: now $169.95!) $150 USD: http://www.films.com/id/9491/Double_Helix.htm
This might be the most expensive DVD here on TPB.
